flavor_text: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.
Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These Pokemon are covered in hard armor.
Its tusks are incredibly destructive. They can easily slice through a thick sturdy steel column every time.
